events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster for further processing.
A recruiter has been assigned to your application to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
Congratulations, you have passed the initial screening. We would like to invite you to a technical interview soon.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10 AM UTC. Please prepare accordingly.
The technical interview is completed. We will review your performance and get back to you shortly.
You have been invited to an HR interview scheduled for May 15th at 3 PM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview was successful; we appreciate your insights and alignment with our company values.
An employment offer has been proposed to you, including detailed salary, benefits, and role responsibilities.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer. We're excited to move forward with your onboarding.
You have accepted the job offer. Welcome aboard! We look forward to working with you.
Your onboarding process has started. Our team will assist you with all necessary documentation and setup.
The hiring process is now complete. We are thrilled to officially welcome you to the Engineering team.
